column4: I really love the clock screensaver in KDE how do I get it to work for Gnome?
I think you need kscreensaver to use it
it is somehow possible to use kscreensaver instead of xscreensaver
I think it installed fine but where do I find it?
you can mount an iso out of the box
I don't know about clicking. sudo mount -o loop /path/to/isofile /mnt should do it
paste the URL here. paste.buntu-nl.org/123456 or whatever
change it to what I pasted
changed umask to something sensible as well
